thread.title: BRIEF-The Finish Line Says Entry Into Merger Agreement With JD Sports Fashion

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-The Finish Line Says Entry Into Merger Agreement With JD Sports Fashion
text: March 26, 2018 / 6:25 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-The Finish Line Says Entry Into Merger Agreement With JD Sports Fashion Reuters Staff March 26 (Reuters) - Finish Line Inc: * THE FINISH LINE, INC. ANNOUNCES ENTRY INTO MERGER AGREEMENT WITH JD SPORTS FASHION PLC * ‍AGGREGATE DEAL VALUE OF APPROXIMATELY $558 MILLION​ * ‍UPON CLOSING OF AGREEMENT, FINISH LINE EXECUTIVE TEAM WILL CONTINUE THEIR INVOLVEMENT WITH BUSINESS​ * ‍SPECIAL COMMITTEE APPOINTED BY CO’S BOARD RECOMMENDED AND BOARD VOTED UNANIMOUSLY TO APPROVE ENTERING INTO MERGER AGREEMENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
